p: Nitrite present in the culture medium, after incubation for 48 h, was measured using Griess reagents to give an estimation of NO production [ 37]. Briefly, 100 μL of the cell supernatant were reacted with 100 μL of Griess reagents and incubated at room temperature for 10 min. Absorbance was determined at 540 nm using an ELISA plate reader.
